title: What is this event?â€‹
content: This event is an open online event to collaboratively work on UN Smart Maps Documentation.

title: How can I participate?â€‹
content: Join via the following Zoom link: https://ucla.zoom.us/j/93249046195 Registration is not required, but we appreciate if you could let us know by replying by chat, etc.
